mapper.sql: t.F_PID, T.F_TENANTS_PID, T.F_FINANCE, T.F_TYPE, T.F_NUM, T.F_TIME, T.F_FILE, T.F_BALANCE, T.F_C1, T.F_C2, T.F_C3, T.F_C4, T.F_C5, t.F_SYS_FLAG, t.F_REMARK, t.F_LAST_MODIFIER, t.F_LAST_MODIFIED_TIME, t.F_CREATOR, t.F_CREATE_TIME
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO T_FINANCE_AUDIT ( F_PID, F_TENANTS_PID, F_FINANCE, F_TYPE, F_NUM, F_TIME, F_FILE, F_BALANCE, F_C1, F_C2, F_C3, F_C4, F_C5, F_SYS_FLAG, F_REMARK, F_LAST_MODIFIER, F_LAST_MODIFIED_TIME, F_CREATOR, F_CREATE_TIME )
SELECT #{entity.id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.tenants_pid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.finance, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.type, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{entity.num, jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{entity.time, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.file, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.balance, jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{entity.c1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.c2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.c3, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.c4, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.c5,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{entity.sysFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.lastModifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.lastModifiedTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} FROM DUAL
mapper.select: select t.*, st.F_NAME as F_TENANTS_NAME from T_FINANCE_AUDIT t left join t_sec_tenants st on t.F_TENANTS_PID = st.F_PID and st.F_SYS_FLAG = '1' where t.F_SYS_FLAG = '1'
